item.title: Wireless External Storage With Native Plex Server
item.description: When Apple launched the Vision Pro, it promised a revolution in spatial computing. But for those of us who love to consume and create media, the limited internal storage quickly became a glaring issue. Enter the WD My Passport Wireless Pro, an unassuming device that has transformed my Vision Pro experience. It’s more than just an external drive; it’s a portable media server, a productivity hub, and a travel essential â€“ all in one sleek package.

item.title: Ollama Unleashed: The DIY LLM Powerhouse on Your Local Machine
item.description: Large language models (LLMs) are powerful tools, but running them on your own can be a challenge. Ollama simplifies this process, allowing you to run these advanced models directly on your local machine, without the need for expensive cloud services or specialized hardware. With Ollama, you gain complete control over your AI tools. Customize them to your specific needs and experiment freely without worrying about high costs. Plus, you can break free from reliance on cloud providers.
